com.pedroalmir.athena.core.stoppingCondition
Class MaintainedStoppingCondition

java.lang.Object
  com.pedroalmir.athena.core.stoppingCondition.MaintainedStoppingCondition
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.common.base.Predicate<Algorithm>, StoppingCondition<Algorithm>, java.lang.Cloneable
public class MaintainedStoppingCondition
extends java.lang.Object
implements StoppingCondition<Algorithm>

A stopping condition that defines an algorithm to be complete if a given stopping condition has been maintained for a number of consecutive iterations.
